effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage.
effect.the_teal_mask: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user inflicts damage by dropping an apple from high above. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.
